channel.title: Redrice News
channel.description: Curated articles about Redrice ventures and related news.

item.title: London-based Self Space gets €2.6 million to set up on-demand therapy on every high street
item.description: Self Space secures funding to make therapy accessible on every high street.

item.title: An Interview with Redrice Ventures
item.description: A discussion with Redrice Ventures about their investment strategy.

item.title: Cardiff-based travel platform Lovetovisit raises €3.8 million to champion local tourism
item.description: Lovetovisit raises funding to boost local tourism in Cardiff.

item.title: Coopah: The Run Coaching App Announces $1.5M Funding Round
item.description: Coopah secures funding to expand its running coaching app.

item.title: Redrice Ventures: Deploying Up to £10M a Year into Early-Stage Consumer Brands
item.description: Redrice Ventures supports early-stage consumer brands with significant investment.

item.title: Spacegoods: Functional Beverage Mushroom
item.description: Spacegoods launches a new functional beverage with mushroom-based ingredients.

item.title: GoJoe raises £2.4M for Gamified Employee Health and Fitness App
item.description: GoJoe secures funding to gamify employee fitness and well-being.

item.title: UK-based social fashion rental platform By Rotation bags €2.7 million to scale rapid growth
item.description: By Rotation raises funding to expand its fashion rental platform.

item.title: Hylo raises £2.5M investment for sustainable athletic footwear expansion plans
item.description: Hylo secures funding to scale its sustainable footwear business.

item.title: Luna Daily raises €3.3 million in funding round to take its feminine care range global
item.description: Luna Daily raises funding to expand its feminine care product line globally.
